top_comments.comment:
A HUGE thanks to Drew and Linda Scott for helping design the interior of my new home! Go follow them on YouTube! https://www.youtube.com/athome. 

Would you like to see any other videos of the house? I can show whats in my fridge, pantry, Mike's Office, and more! Let me know
This is one of the prettiest house and also one of my favourite house love you♥️💖

comments_since_last_sample.body: I love her house! but like if cookie was here she would be happy!!!!! :D right?
it looks like no one lives in this house, its too modern and minimal for me
this is literally my dream house
This is one of the prettiest house and also one of my favourite house love you♥️💖
Wow seriously wow.. That house is beautifulll.. Everything about it.. The decor, furniture, the vibe, the colors.. Soo warm 😍

The fact they brought a house not just for them but took the needs of the whole family in to consideration shows the love and meaning family has to them . With room to spare for mini rho and huskies. 💙
Aren’t you not a very small woman and cook a lot? If so why didn’t you lower your kitchen counter space? Here we all are adjusting it to our needs.
